participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable; enjoys trying new activities and spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I play ice hockey. I live in the united states. I go to high school. Math is my favorite subject. I am a boy.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and passionate about geology; enjoys watching sports and values his long-term relationships.
participant_2.background: I watch every football game at alabama. I am a geology major at alabama university. I never have had alcohol in my life. I currently suffer from social anxiety. I have a girlfriend of 7 years.

content.text: Hey! I'm participant_1.
Hi! I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch football games, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I like to play ice hockey, do math problems, and hang out with my friends.
That's cool! I've never played ice hockey before.
It's a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
I might just do that.
So, what are you majoring in?
I'm majoring in geology at the University of Alabama.
Oh, cool! I've never met anyone who's majoring in geology before.
It's a pretty interesting field. I get to learn about the earth and how it works.
That sounds really cool! I wish I could learn more about it.
You can always take a geology course!
I might just do that.
So, what kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but I mostly play action-adventure games.
Oh, cool! I like those too. What's your favorite action-adventure game?
My favorite action-adventure game is The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
That's a great game! I love the open world and the exploration.
Me too! I've spent hours just exploring the world and finding new things.
That's what I love about that game. It's so open-ended and there's so much to do.
Yeah, it's the best!
So, what do you want to do when you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to graduate school, but I'm not sure what I want to specialize in.
Oh, that's cool. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
Thanks! I hope so.
Well, it was nice talking to you.
You too!
